channel.title: [question] Shop system and stuff like that
channel.description:
Hey, I'm a little bored so I thought I may as well ask this because I've been wondering for a while.
So first of all, one thing I want to do when I'm older is own a large website. I want to own a site similar to turbosquid.com to make a living off of. I basically just want to own my own business in 3d modelling, and general game design. But I dont have much intention on learning php and stuff...
So I need to know how much I would expect to pay someone to make the following:
A very very secure and advanced shop system. There would be two different shops, one where you can simply buy the models and model packs I have made, and another where you can buy other users models.
Any user could come on, make a profile and their own shop. From there they can upload 3d models and textures, instantly. They would have to select the file type it is(in a drop down menu) and give it a description and stuff(so the search feature can find it). They would also have to say how many polygons, if its animated or not, and all that information, and they could upload screenshots of the models as well. If it was a texture, a watermark would automatically be placed on it. Their shop accounts would also work on the forums so that they dont have to register more then once. In their account they have to specify their paypal account too. So then when a user purchases a model from them, 10% of that money would be sent to me(turbosquid takes 50% :o ) Any user on the site could use a search button to look for the model they want. I am not so great at explaining everything, but hopefully you get the general idea of it all. I was wondering how much money that'd cost to hire someone? I was thinking 300-500 dollars? Take a look at [url=http://turbosquid.com/]Turbosquid[/url]
That is pretty much how it would be set up.

item.title: [question] Shop system and stuff like that
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

orrrrrrr write a simple rewrite algortihim replacement mechanism thing

a-BCD

so say

ABC
would become BCDDEFEFG

repeat that 3 times

then that would make a HUGE pass 3 letter pass is 333*3 or 81 chars then take the first 64 of that (64 bit pass) and you got a pass that is never reversable unless u mod the source code to retrieve the pass by not cutting the pass to 64 but that would be illegeal

but u wouldnt do that. Also if some1 stole the DB theyd not ahve the whole pass so they could never crack it only the web host and site owner could. YOu could always md5 the 64 bit pass making really never bruteforce-able or crackable for more security so they ocould never do anything abut it

Read full topic

@sppt wrote:

jme, for safety, you could get someone that mad to write encryption using the mcrypt algotrithm(or however you spell that), its reversable, but you still need the private encryption!

item.title: [question] Shop system and stuff like that
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Ron:

Jme if it’s worth 500 dollars and you will make a living off it, then your 500 dollars is junk compared to how much money you would make… if it’s a success. So maybe if you don’t even want to spend 500 dollars try picking up on PHP. It’s really not that hard.

I guess your right.

I dont want to learn php, or any language anymore. As soon as my game is done Im quitting programming, and going to be a 3d modeller It’s a lot more fun and I still love game design.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

Well this isn’t anything I’m starting up now, but within a few years. I was just bored and just thought I’d ask about the cost of it all. Do you have any idea how much someone would charge for such a job? I’m just hoping its not more then 500 dollars.

item.title: [question] Shop system and stuff like that
item.dc:creator: @Bang_Train Bang Train
item.description:
@Bang_Train wrote:

Your talking some major code

most is ez though

simple DB consiting of

Table - Models
|
|-Owner (user_id)
|-Poly count
|-Pic number (upload script assigns a number and puts in a highly secure location (not in www folder and needs php script to retrieve it))
|-Comment
|-Animated
|-Blah blah blah

so the db is really ez the hard part is the secuirty and makeing each person their own shop (not hard, same theory as people own profile)

as for paypal never touched the thing

for registering on forums , mod a register function for ur site to also trigger the phpbb register function (also ez)

i could do this site but my short attention span and school takes up my time

If u still want this done and dont have any one this summer contact me (i dont design pages just write the backend and front end, You can mod my code into your site easily just copy and paste)

Read full topic
